ValidationRule.description: C18S - Enforce the allowable number of Spanish Binders of 5 or 10 or more Spanish Binders - exclude quantities of 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 or 9. Null, 5 and >= 10 are OK for Spanish_Binder_Quantity__c.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type") || ($RecordType.Name = "Handbook PEO Order Record Type") || ($RecordType.Name = "Handbook Onboarding Order Record Type") || ($RecordType.Name = "Handbook Support Order Record Type") , ( (Spanish_Binder_Quantity__c >= 0) && (Spanish_Binder_Quantity__c <= 4) ) || ( (Spanish_Binder_Quantity__c >= 6) && (Spanish_Binder_Quantity__c <= 9) ), (Historical_Order_Indicator__c = 0), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If you select Spanish Binder Quantity, the acceptable values are 5 or 10 or more binders.
